entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:08 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:35 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
